page.title: 02ART and CRAFT.
page.content: There are two main Art and Craft centres in this area. The first is 'Whitehall Cafe' in Hurst Green.This is owned by Mrs.Alway and her partner.Downstairs is a tea room,and local crafts upstairs.The things that one would find upstairs are knitwear,smocking, embroidery,wood carvings,wooden toys, leatherwork on belts and bracelets and landscape paintings.The paintings,including some of Stonyhurst College,are by Andrew Henderson. The second centre is Mrs.Ramsdale's Pottery Shop in Avenue Road.Orders are taken for any pottery design. Also Mrs.Weld of Judd Falls does picture framing,and Mr.P.Shepherd works in silver at the College.The area also has several skilled craftworkers,like stonemasons and carpenters.
